p: There are several similarities in the clinical features between COVID-19 and previously identified beta-coronavirus infections. Shared clinical findings include that most patients present with fever, dry cough, dyspnea, and bilateral ground-glass opacities on chest CT scans [ 10]. However, the physiopathology of the mechanisms through which SARS-CoV or MERS-CoV sustain high pathogenicity are yet to be completely unveiled.
